data.DescriptionHtml:
As lesser spirit binding, except you may call a single spirit of up to 16 HD or a number of spirits of the same type whose HD total no more than 16.
Each spirit gets a save, makes an independent attempt to escape, and must be individually persuaded to aid you.
data.Name: Spirit Binding
data.Target: Up to 16 HD worth of spirits, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart when they appear
